column3: “This is certainly a top shelf strain, that blasted my senses with many citrus aromas with the flavor to back it up. Very energetic, yet very mellow feeling with a gentle comedown. Great for stating your day off right.”

“Delicious, citrusy, straight up sativa! 

If hybrids make you fall asleep, and you're looking for a daytime strain to supplement your ADHD medication, I am 100% recommending this strain for you!
 
Clear headed and focused, but can still pack a punch if you feel like getting super baked. 

Not ideal for sleepy time, but somehow kickass for meditation. 

 Best wake n' bake strain to date!”
“love this bud, I found it to be very energetic, upbeat high, taste amazing. The down side is that it is in short supply.”
“Too notch, good uplifting high, a little pressure behind the eyes, but I'm super relaxed and my anxiety is zero"”"

“This strain is rad it smells strongly of orange.  The taste is so good too. Just very orange flavor.  I really enjoy the high. Took a trip to the beach feel happy and relaxed. I would buy more for sure”

“Twisted citrus is very fruity.  And the batch I recieved was a pleasant smoke. 👍🏻 As I grounded up the buds, the consistency of the flower was perfect and rolled up in a blunt really well! 
Aroma: A mixture of lemony citrusy orange fruits
Inhale: smoke tasted a bit earthy with sweet undertones 
This strain personally gave me cottonmouth pretty bad every time I smoked it., but not to the point to where I hate this s...”

“Enjoyed a bit of this citrus-y goodness today. The flavor is intense and one can really taste the THC. Really calmed me down and lasted a good while. I would recommend this for morning use. Thanks PotCargo!”

“Starts off a very tingly and head-heavy high, then mellows out into a relaxing buzz that's great for morning tokers. One thing that I love about this strain is that I experienced very little to no paranoia or anxiety, even when trying to push my limits." Mixed this with "Love Potion #1" at one point and was fried out of my brains.”"
“great strain. probably the best tasting strain I've hit too. nice fruit taste”

“My local dispensary provided this for $30 per 10 gram 1/4 so I got an excellent deal on this. i feel like I had to smoke a lot to feel its effects, but it's definitely a decent smoke. if you can find it really cheap, it's worth a try. I found that it always helped me focus and concentrate on my own thoughts so if you're a daytime smoker this is good, but make sure to have another strain to mix it up or else you'll gr...”

“For someone who only smokes indicas, Twisted Citrus got me hooked. It's a nice vibe smoke and it's stinks like citrus and oranges. It's tastes better then how it smells. It's a pretty strong strain and I really recommended it. 9/10”
“Delicious smelling sativa. Doesn't get me too stoned, able to function socially in a good mood.”
“Not normally a Sativa person but Whoa! I haven’t been this baked in awhile. All head buzz right now and can’t wait for a chill afternoon then some work lol. Good flavour and beautiful nugs.”
“I got a distillate cartridge weighing in at about 68% THC and 17% CBD. Euphoric and uplifting with a great body high.”
“nice uplifted”
“the high is uplifting really like it for mornings”
“second time around with this strain and it was just as good as the first.”
“very nice body high, decent taste and smell, nice buds”
“Good head high. Good for the sativa crowd. Very hairy and orange. Good flavor too.”

“Not bad but not very potent I find, it gives you an alright high but doesn't seem to last all that long for me. I must say that the description doesn't lie, as soon as you open your grinder all you can smell is that strong almost orange peel scent.”
“great”
